```ts
function encodeBase58(_value): string
```

Encode `value` as a Base58-encoded string.

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| :------ | :------ | :------ |
| `_value` | [`BytesLike`](/cn/sdk/content/type-aliases/BytesLike) | The value to encode. |

## Returns

`string`

The Base58-encoded string.
